readme:
# Quiet Light theme

One Coding's [Quiet Light](http://onecrayon.com/products/quiet-light/), now in Atom!

This theme was built using the [Textmate port](https://github.com/mkhl/quiet-light.tmtheme) (by Martin KÃ¼hl) and the [apm Textmate theme converter](https://atom.io/docs/v0.120.0/converting-a-text-mate-theme).

![Screenshot](http://f.cl.ly/items/1g2F0P1U0I1J453L3k2B/Screen%20Shot%202014-08-10%20at%2013.15.30%20.png)
